analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika saññojana duka ādi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham gantham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham ogham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham yogam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ parāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
